name: Devesh Agarwal
bio: I'm fundamentally a curious person. Which means I'm usually obsessed with something mildly unreasonable. Last month it might've been 3-D printing tiny elephants. Next month it could be 1960s Japanese cinema. There are no guarantees. By day, I work at a marketplace building AI systems that can help you find a plumber. By night, I write, I watch film, I play squash, I thrift, and I disappear into fiction. I'm deeply fascinated by storytelling - how it shapes us, how it tricks us, how it lingers. This is my small corner of the internet. I intend it to be a living journal of things currently rearranging in my brain. If something here resonates, please reach out! If not, you can always challenge me to a game of chess.
